changeSet.createView: SELECT event_datetime, id, client_id, metadata->'utm'->>'utm_medium' AS utm_medium, metadata->'utm'->>'utm_source' AS utm_source, metadata->'utm'->>'utm_content' AS utm_content, metadata->'utm'->>'utm_campaign' AS utm_campaign, metadata->'utm'->>'utm_term' AS utm_term, NULLIF(metadata->'current_session'->>'referrer', '') AS referrer, COALESCE(metadata->'location'->'address'->>'city', metadata->'locationUserInfo'->>'city') AS city, COALESCE(metadata->'location'->'address'->>'country', metadata->'locationUserInfo'->>'country') AS country, (metadata->'device'->'screen'->>'width') || 'x' || (metadata->'device'->'screen'->>'height') AS viewport, CASE WHEN (metadata->'device'->>'is_phone')::boolean THEN 'phone' WHEN (metadata->'device'->>'is_tablet')::boolean THEN 'tablet' ELSE 'desktop' END AS device, (metadata->'locale'->>'lang') || '-' || (metadata->'locale'->>'country') AS lang, metadata->'browser'->>'os' AS os, metadata->'browser'->>'browser' AS browser, metadata->'locationUserInfo'->>'ip_address' AS ip_address, browser_id FROM sessions ORDER BY event_datetime DESC;
SELECT event_datetime, session_id, metadata->>'id' AS id, metadata->>'type' AS type FROM events AS e ORDER BY e.event_datetime DESC;

SELECT event_datetime, session_id, (metadata->>'banner')::real / 1000 AS banner, (metadata->>'services')::real / 1000 AS services, (metadata->>'process')::real / 1000 AS process, (metadata->>'technologies')::real / 1000 AS technologies, (metadata->>'about')::real / 1000 AS about, (metadata->>'testimony')::real / 1000 AS testimony, (metadata->>'form')::real / 1000 AS form, (metadata->>'footer')::real / 1000 AS footer FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (session_id) * FROM tracking ORDER BY session_id, event_datetime DESC ) AS t ORDER BY t.event_datetime DESC;
